title: Induced current - loop with changing magnetic flux

content.question: The graph shows the magnetic flux through a circular loop as a function of time. Which of the following claims about the induced current in the circular loop is correct and gives an appropriate justification?

choices.label: The induced current changes direction at <math alttext="t equals 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, because the flux changes sign at <math alttext="t equals 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.

The induced current changes direction at <math alttext="t equals 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, because the absolute value of the flux changes from decreasing to increasing at <math alttext="t equals 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.

The induced current remains in the same direction from <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals 20 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, because the flux changes sign at <math alttext="t equals 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.

The induced current remains in the same direction from <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals 20 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, because the flux changes at the same constant rate from <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="t equals 20 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.
